coded_answer.p: First of all I would like to thank you for the chance to domake such a gorgeous trip. We are really looking forward to visiting the city and going to the Museummuseum and the Gallerygallery. However, there is one point that we would like to change in the programme.

We are interested in visiting "The London Fashion and Leisure Show" during our traveltrip. The show is very interesting because we could see the latest fashion, hairstyles and make upmake-up, and also the leisure and sports wear. Furthermore it is totally free for students.
All thisthese exhibiotsexhibits are really important and exciting for us because, nowadays, fashion has a huge influence inon our lifestyle and we would like to know more about it.

We think that we could go there on the next 14th of March, in the eveninngevening, instead of going shopping. This one could be translatemovemoved to the 15th in the evening. It is also possible to go to the show in the morning but we are totally agree that we don't want to lose our visit to the Science Museum.
We truly believehope you will consider our change. Please contact us if you have any question.
